data.text: @ChattyinOz Hi Sharene, if your flight is cancelled or changed by us, depending on the circumstances, cash refunds or free changes to flight dates or times might also be available. Ts and Cs apply. Feel free to DM (Direct Message) us if you require further assistance. Thanks – Ralph
@ChattyinOz Hi Sharene, would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jay
@7homask Hi there! Can you please send us a DM of your booking reference number and complete name, please? -Lee
@andoo8891 Hi there, I appreciate you want to cancel your flights already. Would you mind to send us DM so we can assist you on this? Thanks - Bree
@zero_coupon Hi, we’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a direct message here? – Jaya

@__tim_c Hi Tim, I'm sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. We'd like to assist you with this. Please send us a direct message with your booking reference and full name. – Jaya

@SteveDoggies8 Hi Steve, if your flight is cancelled or changed by us, depending on the circumstances, cash refunds or free changes to flight dates or times might also be available. Ts and Cs apply. Feel free to PM us and quote JQINV585 if you require further assistance. Thanks – Ryan
@Jaswanth_katari Hello @Jaswanth_katari. We have replied to your DM. We apologise for the delayed response. Please check your inbox for more updates. Thanks - Ryan
@Matron6 Hi, @Matron6. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks - Dan
@Hymie313 Hi @Hymie313, I can tell you're disappointed. We’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.

@peterabull @peterabull I am sorry to hear that you're having difficulties contacting our Live Chat and Telephone Reservations. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details so we can look into it? Thanks - Jay
@blu_boys Hi there, you may send us a DM with your booking details so we can assist. Thanks - Bree

@theandypye Hi Andy, I'm sorry for the long wait. It may take a while to reach a representative but I'm sure we're doing our best to accommodate all passengers. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM here? Thanks - Norine
@Qwine Hey Qwine, thanks for flagging this with us. I can confirm that our Travel Alerts Page is up to date with the latest information and it is updated per article. Thanks - Norine

data.text: @theverygoodbra Hello there, apologies for not notifying you of this. Rest assured this won't happen again if you need further assistance. Please send us a DM. -Lee
@AMS1b Hi there, I'm sorry for this inconvenience. We'd like to check this further for you. Please send us a direct message here with your Case ID number and full name. Thanks - Jaya
@sa6r3 Hello there, we already discussed your refund eligibility and you are always eligible for a credit voucher. If you need further information, send us a DM. Thanks! -Lee
@romanabisman04 Hi Bisman, I'm sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We'd like to check this further for you. Would you mind sending us a direct message so we can assist? Thanks - Jaya
@debhennessy21 Hi Deborah, I'm sorry for this inconvenience. We'd like to check this further for you. Please send us a direct message here with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Jaya

@peanut_bummer Hi Ange, I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received a notification about your cancelled flight. Would you mind sending us a direct message? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya
@dubois_jared Hi Jared, thanks for reaching out. We'd like to check this further for you. Please send us a direct message here. Thanks - Jaya
@MathesonRayn Hello Rayn, Please be advised that we are available 7 days a week from 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM. Thanks - Ryan
@jordle18 Hi Jordan, I can tell you're disappointed. We’d like to look into this for you. Please send us a PM and type INV585 to speak with an agent. - Thanks, Ralph.
@ainsindahouse Hi there, sorry to hear that you're having trouble cancelling your flight. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it? Thanks - Leslie
@mikeainsley91 I understand that you would to get reimbursement Carly, I reviewed your booking and I'm unable to provide further request aside from your refund of your flight. - Thanks, Ralph.

@mikeainsley91 Hi Mike, I'm sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Please send us a direct message so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya
@madalyn96509323 That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Madalynn. Please send us a direct message so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya

@TommyMcCrudden Hi Thomas, sorry to hear that. If you’ve made your booking via a third party, you may need to contact them directly for assistance, however we’d be happy to take a look and see what we can do. Could you please DM us with more info so we can assist? Thanks – Leslie

@podpersonaus Hi there, thanks for reaching out. We’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM with your booking reference and full name? - Leslie
@ChrisGatford Hi Chris, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie
@n0xbishop That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, @n0xbishop. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Dan
@stevenandlizzy Hi Steven, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a Direct Message (DM) with more info? – Ralph.
@_Ringtone__ Hi @Rington, I can tell you're disappointed. We’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.
@mikolbin @mikolbin Hi. I am sorry for the inconvenience. Would you mind sending as a DM with your booking details to assist you on this? Thanks - Jay

@IslaStewart Hi Isla. Sorry to hear that you were not able to get through to support, we’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Could you please PM us and key in the code INV585? – Dan
@joshraymond Hi Josh, if there are any changes that we think may affect our customers, we will update our travel alerts page here - https://t.co/9NQ0MQVJYe. I hope that helps - Jay

data.text: @sa6r3 Hi, sorry to hear that you're having trouble cancelling your flight. If you’ve made your booking via a third party, you may need to contact them directly for assistance, however we’d be happy to take a look and see what we can do. Could you please DM us with more info? – Leslie
@stellasugiarto @stellasugiarto Hi Stella. Thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with the details of your complaint? Thanks - Jay

@ainsindahouse Hi ainsindahouse, the website is definitely still taking bookings and that’s where you’ll get the cheapest fares! We recommend clearing your cookies and cache, then trying again. Thanks – Ralph.

@Luke_Martini88 Hi Luke, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to your destination - Bree

@PJneedsleep Hi @PJneedsleep, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a Direct Message. We’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. - Dan
@OliviaSPM Hi Olivia, thanks for bringing this to our attention. I'll be following this up with your case manager. You should hear from them soon. Thanks - Leslie
@Nath_Holt I'm sorry for this inconvenience, Nath. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya
@warndog23 Hi James, would you mind sending us a DM We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Ryan

urls.title: Checking in: When do I need to get to the airport? | Jetstar
urls.description: When's the best time to get to the airport? Here's our guide to when to get to the airport for domestic and international Jetstar flights.

data.text: @Nath_Holt That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Nath. For the domestic flight, the check-in counter opens 90 minutes before departure and closed an hour before. You may also check this link: https://t.co/4zpOM4gqcj. Thanks - Ryan

@wendyfvan Hi Wendy, I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience over the phone and through chat. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@TipsyTopsySmirk Hello @TipsyTopsySmirk. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be. That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Ryan

@JulesssL Hi Jules, I understand you need immediate assistance with your flight. I know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM here? Thanks - Norine
@JulesShark Hi Julie, I'm sorry about the long wait. You may also send us a Direct Message here so we can assist. Thanks - Leslie
@Suburban_mumof2 Hi there, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie
@Lize_Wilson Hi Elizabeth, I'm sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We'd like to look into this further for you. Please send us a direct message here. Thanks - Jaya
@Alid024 Hi Alice. Sorry to hear your flight has been affected by the restriction. Please DM us so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Ryan

@bellelaqueen Hi Belle, I'm sorry for any inconvenience. I know this must be stressful for you. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM here so we can look into it further? Thanks - Norine
@MellieMelster Hi Melanie, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie
@rnllgrcx Hi Ellie, we'd like to assist you with this. Please send us a direct message so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya
@ErskineKristen Hey Kristen, thanks for letting us know - we're glad we were able to assist! We hope your daughter still enjoys her uni break 😊 - Jay
@georgeangelon @georgeangelon Hi, George. I am sorry to hear that. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, -Jay
@jake_embrey @jake_embrey Hi Jake, we’re looking into this now and appreciate your feedback. If you need assistance on a booking, you may send us a DM. Thanks – Jay
@Ms_C_Martinez @Ms_C_Martinez Hi Cherryl. I am sorry for the delay on your flight. Mind sending us a DM to see what we can do? Thanks – Jay

@Ms_C_Martinez Hi Cherryl, I understand the inconvenience that this has caused you. However, compensation for your flight is not an option. I can see that our check-in counter staff provide a voucher due to the disrupted flight. I'm sorry if we cannot proceed with your request. Thanks - Jaya

@Ms_C_Martinez Hi Cherryl, I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@Nath_Holt Hi Nath, the use of masks is mandatory on all flights and in all airports across Australia, except where a medical exemption exists. Team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. Thanks - Dan

urls.title: COVID-related flight changes and cancellations | Jetstar
urls.description: With travel restrictions changing regularly due to COVID-19, you may need to change your travel plans. Check your options for flexible flying here.

data.text: @bcurrall80 Hi Blake, you can be eligible for a credit voucher for the full value of your booking if your flight is cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. Ts and Cs apply. This link may also help: https://t.co/31nhJAaNVo. You may also send us a DM for assistance. Thanks - Bree
@tristajrose Hi Trista, we’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Please send us a direct message here as we're unable to assist further via this post. Thanks - Jaya
@Jofogarty6 Hi Jo, I understand your situation. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@tristajrose Hi TristaR, we’re offering flexibility to customers with bookings impacted by travel restrictions and encourage all customers to check the latest government advice prior to travel. If you require assistance with your booking, feel free to send us a DM. - Leslie

data.text: @Steve23_G Hi Steve, you can be eligible for a credit voucher for the full value of your booking if your flight is cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. Ts and Cs apply. This link may also help: https://t.co/31nhJAaNVo. You may also send us a DM for assistance. Thanks - Bree

@preem1nent Our website works on a ‘first to pay’ basis so if more than one person is trying to book the last few fares at a certain price at the same time, the person who makes their payment first gets that price. Thanks! -Lee

data.text: @benz_daasian Can you send us a DM again Benny. Thanks! -Lee

urls.title: Checked baggage | Size and weight restrictions | Jetstar
urls.description: Your comprehensive reference to the size and weight restrictions for checked baggage on Jetstar domestic and international flights.

data.text: @adamw3001 Hey Adam, maximum allowance that we allow is up to 40 kg only and excess needs to be flown via freight. For more information, please check this link out: https://t.co/cXNcEghSye. Thanks - Chichi
@JimBill1992 @JimBill1992 Hi, we’d appreciate a chance to look into this – please send us a DM with the booking details for assistance. Thanks, Jay

@markheppy Hi Mark, we know how inconvenient cancelled or changed flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to destination. Thanks – Bree
@KirstyMac12 Hey Kirsty, I'm sorry to hear you have difficulties using your voucher. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Norine
@KirstyMac12 Hello, Kirsty. You can still use your voucher by putting the same name of the voucher as the contact person on your booking.  For further assistance, you can send us DM. Thanks. - Ryan
@LouiseTennis Hi there, can you send us a DM of your booking reference number and complete name, please? Thanks -Lee
@ScallywagRay Hi Ray, we’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please DM (Direct Message) to assist you further – Lee

@thejoshmaxwell Hi Joshua, You can manage and check the status of your flight through our Manage Booking at https://t.co/ZF8FEUDCeJ. If you need further assistance, please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks Ralph.
@robertcollings Hi RC, I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We’d like to check this out for you. Please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@Fenrisguard Hi Quinton. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please DM us? – Ryan
@ASX1500 Hi John, we'd really like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message so we can discuss this further. Thanks - Jaya

data.text: @ASX1500 Hi John, we appreciate your feedback. You’ll be eligible for a credit voucher of your booking if your Jetstar Airways flight is cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. Terms and Conditions apply. This link may also help: https://t.co/zrMaIjqtls. Thanks – Bree
@MandyScotney Hi Mandy, we’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM) with your booking.- Thanks, Ralph.
@Yosandr77846502 Hi there, I'm sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie
